channel.title: Arthur on Arthur's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Arthur on Arthur's Blog

item.title: 10 Useful GitHub Copilot Tricks
item.description: Engineers often have endless tasks, so development efficiency is a major goal. GitHub Copilot, as an AI development tool, can do many things, including code generation and explanation, fixing specific errors, optimizing code, writing tests and documentation, and more.

item.title: Explaining Factory Patterns Through Barbecue (Part 2)

item.title: Explaining Factory Patterns Through Barbecue (Part 1)
item.description:
Three Types of Factory Patterns

  1. Simple Factory Pattern

  2. Factory Method Pattern

  3. Abstract Factory Pattern

item.title: Design Patterns Learning Map
item.description:
Preface

Before learning design patterns, it is best to have a certain understanding of OO (Object-Oriented) related knowledge, so that you can quickly understand the operation mechanism of each design pattern. The following diagram is a map of background knowledge for design patterns:

item.title: Understand design patterns to enhance the reusability of your code
item.description:
What is a Design Pattern?

Design Pattern is a solution to a specific problem, a set of programming experiences summarized to solve recurring problems.

item.title: Demystify JasperReports
item.description:
Introduction

  • An open-source library developed for Java

  • Develop extensible dynamic reports

  • Features include tables, charts, maps, sub-reports, etc.

  • Supports exporting to various formats (docx, xls, odt, ods, pdf, html…​)

  • Can provide data through various methods (csv, JDBC, json…​)
